rows.label: qst104701_msg001
rows.name: I wonder what ship that is.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0001
rows.name: Is something the matter, ma'am?

rows.label: qst104701_msg0002
rows.name: And you are...?

rows.label: qst104701_msg0003
rows.name: Forgive me... My name is Byakko.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0004
rows.name:
You seemed troubled, so I felt
compelled to speak with you.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0005
rows.name:
Hehe... Perhaps it's
because we're both beast-like
that you understood.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0006
rows.name: I am Enju...

rows.label: qst104701_msg0007
rows.name:
This ship is bound for
Torigo in Gula...

rows.label: qst104701_msg0008
rows.name:
The passengers are people who,
despairing of the Empire's future,
are fleeing the Imperial Capital.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0009
rows.name:
After all that's happened...
It cannot be helped.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0010
rows.name:
And the one chosen as the
intermediary is my Driver,
Orca, who is a Gulan.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0011
rows.name:
He was scouted as a Driver,
resonated with me, and
came to the capital.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0012
rows.name:
But... he is too kind. He
dislikes fighting and conflict.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0013
rows.name:
I wonder if he can go to Torigo and
manage to reconcile the people of
Gula and the people of Superbia...

rows.label: qst104701_msg0014
rows.name:
If he is as kind as you say,
then I am sure it will be fine.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0015
rows.name: My Driver is also from Gula...

rows.label: qst104701_msg0016
rows.name:
And among our companions is a
Superbian, but we all get along well.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0017
rows.name:
That is wonderful! Perhaps
we too can help foster
understanding between them...

rows.label: qst104701_msg0018
rows.name:
Everyone, I am worried for her...
for the people on this ship.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0019
rows.name:
Would it be alright if
we watched over them?

rows.label: qst104701_msg0020
rows.name: Thank you!

rows.label: qst104701_msg0021
rows.name: Are you sure? That is a great comfort!

rows.label: qst104701_msg0022
rows.name: This ship will be departing very soon.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0023
rows.name:
Could I ask you to come to
the Superbian military's
Torigo Relay Base in Gula?

rows.label: qst104701_msg0024
rows.name: Yes, we will head there!

rows.label: qst104701_msg0025
rows.name: Then, until we meet again...
